title: Request for Proposal for a Corporate Banquet
description: A company requests a proposal for their annual awards banquet, including a three-course meal and an open bar.

tasks.description: Gather details on the event date, expected number of guests, and budget.
Create a sample menu and pricing package based on the client's requirements.
Generate a formal proposal including menu, pricing, and available dates, and send it to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional proposal is sent to the potential client.
